keys: Gesetz des Newtons zweiter der Bewegung
La loi de newton deuxièmes du mouvement
Lei do newton segundo do movimento
Legge del Newton secondo di movimento
Ley del neutonio segundo del movimiento
resource_data:

    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:melt.cup.cam.ac.uk:cahi1:data_106653</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_106653</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">How friction helps move objects</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wie Friktion Hilfen Nachrichten verschieben</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Comment les aides de frottement déplacent des 
objets</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Como as ajudas da fricção movem objetos</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Come gli aiuti di attrito spostano gli oggetti</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πώς οι οδηγίες τριβής κινούν τα αντικείμενα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Cómo las ayudas de la fricción mueven objetos</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">These figures show how friction helps a runner (left) and a tyre (right) move by opposing the backwards push of the object.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Acceleration</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">backwards push</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Force</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">forward push</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Friction</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">motion</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Newton's second law of motion</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildungen zeigen, wie Friktion einem 
Läufer (nach links) und einer (rechten) Bewegung des Reifens hilft, 
indem sie rückwärts dem Stoß der Nachricht entgegensetzt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ces figures montrent comment le frottement aide un 
coureur (à gauche) et mouvement de pneu (un bon) en s'opposant vers 
l'arrière à la poussée de l'objet.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Estas figuras mostram como a fricção ajuda a um 
corredor (à esquerda) e a um movimento (direito) do tyre opondo para 
trás o impulso do objeto.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Queste figure mostrano come l'attrito aiuta un 
corridore (a sinistra) e movimento del pneumatico (un giusto) 
opponendo indietro la spinta dell'oggetto.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτοί οι αριθμοί επιδεικνύουν πώς η τριβή βοηθά 
έναν δρομέα (αριστερά) και ένα ελαστικό αυτοκινήτου (δεξιά) να 
κινηθούν με να αντιτάξει την προς τα πίσω ώθηση του αντικειμένου.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Estas figuras muestran cómo la fricción ayuda a
un corredor (a la izquierda) y a un movimiento (derecho) del 
neumático oponiendo al revés el empuje del objeto.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Beschleunigung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">rückwärts Stoß</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kraft</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">schicken Sie Stoß nach</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Friktion</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bewegung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Gesetz des Newtons zweiter der Bewegung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Accélération</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">pousser vers l'arrière</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Force</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">expédiez la poussée</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Frottement</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">mouvement</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
